lender.loan_because: When I ask myself why not,no answer comes to mind.

lender.name: Michiel
lender.loan_because: I believe in small scale bottom-up initiatives that empower individuals who lack the resources to become economically independent and escape poverty.

lender.name: Gloria Jean
lender.loan_because: I am prepared to loan because of the mission and goals of the Kiva Org...It's all about being willing to help others accomplish their dreams and in turn be able to help others like an interlinking chain around the world....
lender.occupational_info: My work is meant to inspire and encourage the highest good...to reach out, with compassionate and visionary eyes to help solve and, examine some of the problems faced by peoples around the planet -to join as one.... in understanding and compassion...one humanity. My first poem ever publisned...I look into the eyes of life to see hope pictured there and to understand who I am and why I'm here. "The Eyes Of Life." (GloriaJean)

lender.name: bees
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jennifer and Greg
lender.loan_because: our parents worked hard to provide us with a good life. We would like to give back and help others provide for their families.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: Its easy to see yourself in such a position. All it would take is one earthquake, tornado or hurricane to find ourselves in such a position.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independant mechanic as i live in a severely depressed economic region of the United States. There are no jobs and the few jobs that are here are being filled by illegals who are being taken advantage of by greedy business owners and politicians at the expense of American citizens. So we have our own set of challenges here for certain. But to not help someone who is fighting through worse economic conditions is not acceptable.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: someone else inspired me from another website.
lender.occupational_info: I get my butt chewed out on a daily basis as a U.S. Soldier.

lender.name: Serene Reflexology
lender.loan_because: Foot massage, reflexology, Orange County, California, Westminster CA
lender.occupational_info:
Serene Reflexology, Orange County’s favorite foot massage spa. Here at Serene Reflexology, Orange County’s best kept secret, you will be treated to the most relaxing hour of reflexology and foor massage by a highly trained staff of reflexologists which will relieve your stress and tension on our feet back and shoulders.
Foot massage and reflexology, servicing Orange County California, Westminster, Bolsa, Magnolia, Little Saigon, Aliso Viejo,Anaheim,Brea,Buena Park,Costa Mesa,Cypress,Foothill Ranch,Fountain Valley,Fullerton,Garden Grove,Huntington Beach,Irvine,Lake Forest,Long Beach,Los Alamitos,Mission Viejo,Newport Beach,Orange,Placentia,RSM,Santa Ana,Seal Beach,Stanton,Sunset Beach,Tustin,Westminster,Yorba Linda.

lender.name: Gregoire
lender.loan_because: A small fraction of the wealth of an individual in an industrialized country can turn around the life of a whole community of the third world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide service and support for water treatment chemicals and equipments for industries using water in their manufacturing processes.

lender.name: Eeva
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and it makes mee feel good. It warms my heart to know that this small amount of money can help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a pharmacy.

lender.name: Adriaan
lender.loan_because: I think helping entrepreneurs is one of the best ways to spend your money.

lender.name: talent
lender.loan_because: Im grateful for the opportunity Kiva has given me to offer a helping hand.

lender.name: monica
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I'm just starting a new business. It's very slow, but I believe if I hang in there I will see results.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principles of microfinance as a way of promoting economic development and improving the situation of women around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I translate technical documents, business communication and legal information. I believe that international trade promotes peace and stability in most cases, and I am pleased to contribute to that in my role as a translator.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: To give other people a chance to fully develop theirselfs and their business.

lender.name: Haddon

lender.name: TJ & MARGE
lender.loan_because: We want to contribute to global change.

lender.name: Toby
lender.loan_because: I believe many people have the talent to run a small business. This is a way for me to help others like I have been helped many times.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I'm all about teaching people how to fish rather than giving them a fish.

lender.name: shelly
lender.loan_because: i have received loans and paid back loans that have allowed me to build my wealth. i lived in east africa, malawi, on the salary of that nation; one of the poorest economies in the world.
lender.occupational_info: health care provider

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people develop a sustainable means of supporting their families and local communities.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I would like to lend money to people who are less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: Mary Jane (MJ)
lender.loan_because: It is important to me to help those that are willing to help themselves. This program seems to reward people for hard work and diligence in the face of adversity.
lender.occupational_info: Reduce waste and variation in the manufacturing process through a methodical program called Six Sigma

lender.name: DONALD
lender.loan_because: It helps someone and it makes you feel good.

lender.name: Brianna
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a little help and Kiva is a great concept.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: I believe it empowers individuals and supports entrepreneurism.
lender.occupational_info: I work in international relations, also development cooperation. Some of the projects are huge, take long to set up and even longer to take effect. lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Adolph

lender.name: Damon Lewis
lender.loan_because: I can and should

lender.name: Niels
lender.loan_because:
Some people need the support. If I can help some of them starting or improving their business so they eventualy can be self supporting then that would be a great feeling.
Also when a loan is payed back I can use that money again to help others. This makes it better then just giving money to charity.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain several flavours of webservers, cms servers, portal servers etc. Hosting a total of about 36.000 websites.

lender.name: Laon Laan
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve people's lives specially those who work hard for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: Any little bit helps for those that are really trying to make ends meet for themselves and families in impoverished circumstances.

lender.name: Amina
lender.occupation: I am a Spanish teacher and a PhD student.
lender.loan_because: My family comes from humble beginnings and I am very grateful for my parents' sacrifices.As an African woman, I've seen many struggle to provide for their family especially in rural areas . I am truly humbled to help in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: Introverted, reserved, avid reader, compassionate, twin sister and chocolate addict.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Marc & Jane
lender.loan_because: We want to share what we have received and loaning through Kiva connects me with the world. The teachings and the love of Jesus compel us to share what we have.

lender.name: Dolcee

lender.occupational_info: I am retired and now do charity work. I sew knapsacks for school children. They are sent all over the world. I knit for local charities.

lender.name: Mary Jo Sisley

lender.occupational_info: For 34 years I was involved in building buildings, and making sure they were built safely and correctly

lender.name: Ramón
lender.loan_because: I have seen bad things happen to good people and think there is no justice to the universe. I have not seen people treat each other well, and why this is troubles and eludes me. I think grief is universal, but everyone grieves in their own way.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It is an honor to help people who are willing to work hard to make a better life for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: My company publishes 'how-to' guides and provides consulting to people who want to buy their own businesses. I LOVE the idea that I can play a role in helping people achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. There have been many times in my life when people have helped me, that now for me giving is central to my life.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I'm so thankful for everything I have in my life. I'm happy to be able to share what I have to help others around the world.

lender.name: Michelle

lender.name: Ankur and Neha
lender.loan_because: We admire and respect zeal to be self-sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: I have been involved with various technology start-ups ever since I was 15. I like to nurture an enterprise guide my fellow friends ( I don't like to call them clients) and help them grow it into a self-sustaining entity, that creates new employment opportunities within community and help make my friends wealthy. My last successful venture was in High Tech Surveillance Systems, High Speed Internet Infrastructure development, Technology Support management. I am looking forward to start-up another venture involving agribusiness dealing in products like menthol, ethanol , essential oils , raw sugar etc.

lender.name: serg
lender.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
Our mission at Channel 6 Media is to launch the Global Equality Movement (GEMS). It includes many thing but we aim to create develop and deliver broadcasting and media opportunities to strengthen diversity and democratic plurality, globally. In other words, we create media to advance equality and human rights for all people.
Further to that, I believe that if you want something you must do it your self. The media that we produce is about many things but underlying all we do is to empower people so that they can do for themselves. (give a man a fish he eats for a day but teach him how to fish he'll eat forever).

lender.name: oneMynd
lender.occupational_info: oneMYnd is leading the plane of personal growth and self development of the new generations. oneMYnd is geared toward giving the power back to those who hold the knowledge. We are creating the first ever online environment for coaches to share their specific information in the most innovative and stimulating way. We are crafting tremendous value added services for each and every student that joins oneMYnd. In short, oneMYnd is changing the way the world learns and ultimately how the world does business.
